title: How to be an SEO freelancer - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are new to SEO then you need to take a course on the subject. Udemy is a good place to start and you might be lucky to find a free one.
I have written a detailed blog on the same on how you can become an SEO Expert. That would surely help you out. GUIDE TO BECOME AN SEO EXPERT!! Happy Learning!!
